00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_MEMORYTRACKER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_MEMORYTRACKER_H
00024 
00025 #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace Hypertable {
00028 
00029   class MemoryTracker {
00030   public:
00031     MemoryTracker() : m_memory_used(0), m_item_count(0) { return; }
00032 
00033     void add_memory(uint64_t amount) {
00034       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00035       m_memory_used += amount;
00036     }
00037 
00038     void remove_memory(uint64_t amount) {
00039       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00040       m_memory_used -= amount;
00041     }
00042 
00043     uint64_t get_memory() {
00044       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00045       return m_memory_used;
00046     }
00047 
00048     void add_items(uint64_t count) {
00049       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00050       m_item_count += count;
00051     }
00052 
00053     void remove_items(uint64_t count) {
00054       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00055       m_item_count -= count;
00056     }
00057 
00058     uint64_t get_items() {
00059       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00060       return m_item_count;
00061     }
00062 
00063   private:
00064     boost::mutex m_mutex;
00065     uint64_t m_memory_used;
00066     uint64_t m_item_count;
00067   };
00068 
00069 }
